actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to bolster fairness and transparency in the consideration of interstate natural gas pipeline permits, to provide for greater public input opportunities in the natural gas pipeline permitting process, and for other purposes.
short_title: Pipeline Fairness, Transparency, and Responsible Development Act of 2022

summary.text:
Pipeline Fairness, Transparency, and Responsible Development Act of 2022

This bill addresses provisions related to natural gas pipeline projects, including provisions related to the permitting process, eminent domain, environmental reviews, and the visual impacts of such projects on national scenic trails.

titles.title: Pipeline Fairness, Transparency, and Responsible Development Act of 2022
Pipeline Fairness, Transparency, and Responsible Development Act of 2022

A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to bolster fairness and transparency in the consideration of interstate natural gas pipeline permits, to provide for greater public input opportunities in the natural gas pipeline permitting process, and for other purposes.
